posts.title: Hat Brim Clip-on Light
posts.content: The hat brim clip-on light keeps you visible at night without giving you that dorky coal miner look that other head gear gives you. Powered by easily replaceable lithium batteries, this lightweight light source clips onto the hat brim to provide an adjustable high beam light.

posts.title: One-Piece Bib & Baby Plate
posts.content: This one-piece bib and baby plate is a heaven-sent for any parent who’s forced to feed their little one on-the-go. The clever and ultra functional design serves as a lunchbox, plate, and bib so that Jr. can comfortably eat on his own without making a total mess.

posts.title: Cocktail Smoking Box & Gun
posts.content: Set your drinks apart from the rest by giving them a smoky flavor using this cocktail smoking box and gun. You simply place your drink inside the elegant and sturdy steel framed glass cage and pump it full of smoke to achieve a unique flavor.

posts.title: Crappy Children’s Art Book
posts.content: Laugh at the misfortune of children by witnessing their horrible attempts at creativity by reading  the Crappy Children’s Art Book. This hilarious book will have you in stitches with pages full of failed children’s drawings along with brutally harsh criticisms of the botched art.

posts.title: Baby Up In This Bitch Car Sticker
posts.content: Force the mark ass drivers around you to take notice in the fact that you’re transporting precious cargo with the “baby up in this bitch” car sticker. It’s the ideal way to inform your fellow drivers to be careful without losing your street cred.

posts.title: Instant Coffee Cubes
posts.content: Enjoy a cup of Joe even if you’re nowhere near a cafe by dropping one of these instant coffee cubes into a mug of hot water. The cubes come in a compact size that make them easy to take anywhere and are made with Colombian beans from the Ocamonte region.

posts.title: Bluetooth Kitchen Thermometer
posts.content: Ensure your meals are cooked to perfection by preparing your poultry with the Bluetooth kitchen thermometer. Instead of having to constantly check up on your bird, it lets you monitor everything from your phone so you know when it’s at just the right point.

posts.title: Gold Glitter Lips
posts.content: Give your lips the Midas touch with these gold glitter lips temporary tattoos. Perfect for giving your face a head turning look, these gold glitter lips temporary tattoos are easy to apply and will last up to eight hours, which is longer than most lipsticks.

posts.title: Reversible Measuring Cup & Spoon Set
posts.content: This reversible measuring cup and spoon set makes getting accurate measurements easier than ever. This easy to clean design lets you view your measurements with greater accuracy so your baked goods taste exactly as intended from the recipe.

posts.title: Electronic Doggy Door
posts.content: Bring the doggy door into the 21st century with the electronic doggy door. This automatic door features a quality design that is engineered for performance and reliability. Every time Rex wants to go in or out of the house, the small ultrasonic collar activates the door.

posts.title: Millennium Falcon Owner’s Manual
posts.content: Keep your Millennium Falcon running in tip-top shape with this extremely detailed owner’s workshop manual. Whether you’re looking to complete the Kessel Run in less than 12 parsecs, or just want to avoid issues with your hyperdrive motivator, you need this book.

posts.title: Clapperboard Digital Alarm Clock
posts.content: Begin your days as if your were an A-List celebrity on set of a Hollywood blockbuster by waking up with this clapperboard digital alarm clock. Styled like the iconic film industry clapperboards, the time and date comes displayed in bright, legible red digits.
